title: Experiential Online Master Class for Corporate Financial and Socioeconomic Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting terminology, understanding of financial statement structures, and foundational concepts of social systems and economic frameworks
context.additional_context: Curriculum utilizing software and game tools optimized for smartphone learning, exploring case studies on the interplay between corporate management and social responsibility.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze actual corporate cases via mobile app simulations to perform cost calculation and budgeting processes, linking economic decision-making with social impact assessment.
Learners can create financial statement analysis and visualization reports using Excel mobile-compatible spreadsheet templates, integrating economic indicators with social responsibility elements.

Learners predict the impact of decision-making with over 80% accuracy through team-based business simulations on a gamified quiz platform, analyzing economic outcomes and changes in stakeholder relationships.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
